validLogin.description: User should be able to login with valid credentials
validLogin.assertion: User is successfully logged in and redirected

invalidEmail.description: Login should fail with invalid email format

invalidPassword.description: Login should fail with invalid password

emptyForm.description: Form submission should be prevented when fields are empty
emptyForm.assertion: Login form should still be visible
emptyForm.validationMessage: Please fill in all required fields

userSignup.description: User should be able to sign up with valid information
userSignup.assertion: Signup success message should be displayed

mobileMenuClose.description: Mobile navigation menu should close properly
mobileMenuClose.expectedResult: Menu closes when navigation action is completed
mobileMenuClose.assertion: Menu element should not be visible after navigation

colorPalette.description: Color palette should be updated according to design system
colorPalette.assertion: CSS custom properties should contain new color values

typography.description: Typography should be updated according to design system
typography.assertion: CSS font properties should match new typography rules

paymentGateway.description: Payment gateway API should be properly integrated
paymentGateway.assertion: Payment form elements should be visible and functional

documentation.description: API endpoints should be properly documented
documentation.assertion: API documentation should contain required sections

ios.description: Push notifications should work on iOS devices
ios.assertion: Notification permission should be granted and working

android.description: Push notifications should work on Android devices
android.assertion: Notification permission should be granted and working

dataSync.description: Offline data synchronization should work properly
dataSync.assertion: Offline indicator should show appropriate status

requiredSizes.description: Mobile app icons should be available in all required sizes
requiredSizes.assertion: App icons should have proper alt text and dimensions

contentPlanning.description: Social media content should be planned for next month
contentPlanning.assertion: Content calendar should contain planned campaign items

q2Campaign.description: Q2 email campaign should be designed and implemented
q2Campaign.assertion: Email campaign should contain required content and elements

contentApproval.description: Landing page content should be reviewed and approved
contentApproval.assertion: Landing page should display approved content sections
